message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and your interest in it.

Alice,  $12,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  This is still a fair price considering the value you place on it and my interest in buying it.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save a bit more, but I still need to make a profit on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. This is a fair compromise considering the value I place on it and your interest in buying it.
